subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Hall of Famer Steve Yzerman is the Tampa Bay Lightning’s new general manager, taking on the task of rebuilding a franchise that has fallen on hard times since winning its only Stanley Cup championship six years ago.
snippet: The Hall of Famer Steve Yzerman is the Tampa Bay Lightning’s new general manager, taking on the task of rebuilding a franchise that has fallen on hard times since winning its only Stanley Cup championship six years ago.
